lead_paragraph: Darron Stiles made a 10-foot birdie putt on his final hole to shake free from a crowded pack atop the leader board in the second round of the PGA Tour's Buick Championship in Cromwell, Conn., yesterday.
snippet: Darron Stiles made a 10-foot birdie putt on his final hole to shake free from a crowded pack atop the leader board in the second round of the PGA Tour's Buick Championship in Cromwell, Conn., yesterday.
